nodes.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。

nodes.excerpt: ZelaaPayAE crypto cards allow for transactions online and in brick-and-mortar establishments at market rates, backed by our cryptocurrency ZPAE. With the ZPAYae card, you can immediately exchange fiat to crypto and then pay directly for your goods or send it to a friend.

nodes.excerpt: Instantly create a mockup for any website. Paste the page URL and instantly generate a wireframe image of the site or your favorite websites in full-page resolution (3000 x 2000 pixels) with the background color of your choice.

nodes.excerpt: Keeping up with Slack channels demands your attention and time! Let Grok do the comprehending with the power of GPT-3. Summarize any Slack Channel on-demand, in a daily digest, or when joining a channel.

nodes.excerpt: PowerFarm platform lets run and orchestrate your Selenium and mobile tests on the cloud. It monitors results quickly and thoroughly and ensures smooth integration with repositories or other platforms. Learn more by joining our early access program.
nodes.title: PowerFarm - Orchestrate and manage your tests in the cloud.
nodes.author: Wojtek Smajda

localize.description: PowerFarm平台可以让您在云端运行和协调Selenium和移动测试。它可以快速、彻底地监控结果，并确保与存储库或其他平台顺利集成。通过加入我们的早期访问计划了解更多信息。
localize.tagline: 在云端协调和管理您的测试。

localize.tagline: 在雲端協調和管理您的測試。

nodes.excerpt: Gemini 2 detects duplicate and similar files in every corner of your Mac, including Photos, Music, and even external drives. And helps you free up tons of disk space. Plus, now it spots new copies right away so that they won’t pile up again.
nodes.title: Duplicates Monitor by Gemini 2 - Keep your Mac duplicate-free at all times
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 双子座2可以检测到你Mac的每个角落里的重复和类似文件，包括照片、音乐，甚至是外部驱动器。并帮助你释放大量的磁盘空间。此外，现在它能立即发现新的副本，以免它们再次堆积。
localize.tagline: 让你的 Mac 始终保持无复制状态

localize.description: 雙子座2可以檢測到你Mac的每個角落裏的重複和類似文件，包括照片、音樂，甚至是外部驅動器。並幫助你釋放大量的磁盤空間。此外，現在它能立即發現新的副本，以免它們再次堆積。
localize.tagline: 讓你的 Mac 始終保持無複製狀態

nodes.excerpt: https://www.wingspan.app/ erases all the worst parts of freelancing– taxes, benefits, accounting, invoice & expense tracking, registering an LLC, even your tax withholdings. The ease and beauty of a payroll platform, but optimized for freelancers and independent professionals.

nodes.excerpt: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
nodes.title: The Podcast Audience Graph - Visualize podcast audience connections in 3D.
nodes.author: James Potter

localize.description: 我们根据Apple Podcasts中的 "听众也订阅 "数据收集了280万个播客连接。现在，你可以在3D图中直观地看到任何播客的邻居（以及它的邻居的邻居），并看到哪些其他播客有类似的听众。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可视化播客的受众连接。

localize.description: 我們根據Apple Podcasts中的 "聽衆也訂閱 "數據收集了280萬個播客連接。現在，你可以在3D圖中直觀地看到任何播客的鄰居（以及它的鄰居的鄰居），並看到哪些其他播客有類似的聽衆。
localize.tagline: 以3D方式可視化播客的受衆連接。

nodes.title: Firefox Relay - Hide your real email address to help protect your identity.
nodes.author: qztn

localize.description: Firefox Relay 可以轻松创建别名，即随机生成的电子邮件地址，并转发到您的真实收件箱。使用它来保护你的在线账户和你的身份，防止黑客入侵。
localize.tagline: 隐藏您的真实电子邮件地址，以帮助保护您的身份。

localize.description: Firefox Relay 可以輕鬆創建別名，即隨機生成的電子郵件地址，並轉發到您的真實收件箱。使用它來保護你的在線賬戶和你的身份，防止黑客入侵。
localize.tagline: 隱藏您的真實電子郵件地址，以幫助保護您的身份。

nodes.excerpt: Canary Mail brings a simple design, powerful feature-set, and easy-to-use email encryption. Now on Android.
nodes.title: Canary Mail - Privacy-friendly email app for macOS, iOS & Android
nodes.author: Sohel Sanghani

localize.description: 金丝雀邮件带来了简单的设计、强大的功能设置和易用的邮件加密功能。现在在安卓系统上。
localize.tagline: MacOS、iOS 和 Android 的隐私友好型电子邮件应用。

localize.description: 金絲雀郵件帶來了簡單的設計、強大的功能設置和易用的郵件加密功能。現在在安卓系統上。
localize.tagline: MacOS、iOS 和 Android 的隱私友好型電子郵件應用。

nodes.excerpt: Version data, track models, train on custom clusters - without worrying about setting up infrastructure or cloud compute. Save on cloud costs by only paying for what you need. Run hyperparameter sweeps on multiple nodes with the click of a button.
nodes.title: latch.ai - Train, track and serve machine learning on the cloud.
nodes.author: Kenny Workman

localize.description: 版本数据、跟踪模型、在自定义集群上进行训练--无需担心设置基础设施或云计算。只需为您需要的东西付费，即可节省云计算成本。只需点击一个按钮，即可在多个节点上运行超参数扫描。
localize.tagline: 在云上训练、跟踪和服务机器学习。

localize.description: 版本數據、跟蹤模型、在自定義集羣上進行訓練--無需擔心設置基礎設施或雲計算。只需爲您需要的東西付費，即可節省雲計算成本。只需點擊一個按鈕，即可在多個節點上運行超參數掃描。
localize.tagline: 在雲上訓練、跟蹤和服務機器學習。
